name: Pyramid Scheme
description:
Utah Indie Game Jam 2016 Entry for team Samurai Wasp

Pyramid Scheme

You are a Professor of Archaeology who was scorned for your belief in real disembodied voices guiding the actions of pharaohs in ancient Egypt. One day you wake to find yourself in an ancient tomb, and some voices start speaking to you. You quietly take a recording. They don't seem to answer you but if you can solve the puzzles and find the HIDDEN escape route and get out alive with this recording, you can finally prove it to the world once and for all!

Audio file is some sample dialog that may not have made it into the game.
